items.value:
Hey Dude!

Have you ever met Romana?
She lives by the sea where you were fishing recently.

I want to surprise Romana with cakes for the party!
Can you please bring the Birthday Cake to her?
She will also give you an invitation card.
Please bring me this card!
sounds good but my Inventory is full!

Thank you so much!
Romana is one of my best friends..

You got:
1x Birthday Cake
1x Metro Ticket

She have blond hairs and a red dress!
okay Kelly, i will visit Romana at the Sea!
